website_summaries.verdict: Superior recharge rate. Customer reviews are mostly positive with a few exceptions that point to shorter battery life.
pros: Superior starting power and long-term energy
Fast recharge rate of 4 to 6 hrs
cons: Sporadic, anecdotal evidence of battery life that lasts less than one year

customer_reviews.title: Great for fireworks.
customer_reviews.text: 1.5 year old battery blew up in my car while idling in my driveway. Manufacturer referred me to Amazon for warranty. I would assume a product catastrophically blowing up under normal usage would garner more attention, apparently not. Battery was always kept on a CTEK trickle charger. I honestly wont trust another Optima battery. This was my 4th and it will be my last.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mahar

customer_reviews.title: Quality is no longer there - two failed in two years.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of the Optima yellow tops and both failed within two years. Amazon reffered me to Optima for warranty claims. Optima wants me to jump through hoops to get it replaced under warranty. Optima Customer Service instructed me to take it to a parts store and have them test and provide the results in writing back to them. Among the options from Optima was to have it tested at O'Rielly auto parts. Their testing equipment indicated the battery was bad but they would not provide anything in writing (yes O'Rielly is an Optima dealer but would not help me). Never again will I purchase an Optima battery.
customer_reviews.author: Triumph Sprint Rider

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t live up to Reputation
customer_reviews.text: Had this battery in my 2008 WRX for just under 2 yrs. I bought this battery because of Optima’s sterling reputation in the car community. After leaving my car parked for 60 days, I expected it to start right up, it didn’t. I put it on a battery charger and patiently waited overnight for it to charge. Still no start. I jumped it and let the car run for three hours and verified that the alternator output was at 14 volts. Turned the car off and went to start it the next morning, no start. $270 for a battery that had a shorter useable life than a Walmart battery. NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Brown

customer_reviews.title: Costly fail
customer_reviews.text: Had this battery for 28 months and it just died. The warranty lasts for 36 months. So I followed the warranty instructions and called Amazon. Amazon says they can't help me and I need to contact the manufacturer. Now I will be without a vehicle for 4+ days. Next time I will buy my battery locally.
customer_reviews.author: Nike Golf

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD...sad waste of hundreds of dollars
customer_reviews.text: This battery failed completely in only 7 months. It was received with parts broken. At the time I NEEDED the battery and did not take a moment to file a complaint...I also don't complain usually. In the end this battery failed to hold a charge after 6 months and was in 100% failure within 7. I think it was a second or a tosser that was resold. Might explain why it did not arrive in a stock box.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Battery did not last one year!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this battery for my restored Volkswagen. I wanted a sealed battery that wouldn’t corrode and would hold it’s charge without too much driving. After being installed and driving for one summer the vehicle was stored in the climate controlled garage for a couple of months. This week I attempted to start my car and it was totally dead. I’ve attempted to charge the battery but it won’t hold a charge. I took it too a professional battery store for testing. It won’t hold a charge and it tests bad. Not what I would expect from an Optima battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT....don’t believe them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product details and specifications indicated that this batter was an exact fit for a 2014 Subaru Crosstek hybrid. Upon receipt, today, we tried swapping out the batteries and not only is the battery too wide to fit under the battery mounting bar and ground wires, but the anode and cathode terminals were too big to fit the factory clamps. I expect a full refund and shipping since the selling details and specifications were not accurate nor represented the product. I am quite annoyed that I cannot simply return this inaccurately represented product and have to contact customer care.
customer_reviews.author: stargazr

customer_reviews.title: No Warranty Support
customer_reviews.text: Battery arrived undamaged and charged. Installed without a problem. I have been using Optima batteries since 1997. I have purchased 9 of these batteries from various places over the years but only this one off of Amazon. I have gotten at least 7 years out everyone of them except this one. This lasted a little over 2 years. The date on the battery though is a little over 3 years. The problem is nobody would warranty this battery locally under the 3 year replacement since I didn't purchase it from them. I cannot recommend these batteries since there appears to be no warranty support for them.
customer_reviews.author: B-Ri

customer_reviews.title: Not the high quality item they once we're.
customer_reviews.text: I've previously had good luck with Optima batteries. They've routinely lasted me 48 to 60 months and I've been happy with my purchases. Unfortunately, I didn't have a good experience this time around. This one worked for less than 20 months before needing to be replaced. Since these are only warrantied for one year, Optima is under no obligation to replace it for me. That is not money well spent. My next battery will come from a company that offers a better warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Carita

customer_reviews.title: No such thing as Deep Cycle
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I buy into the "deep cycle" thing anymore. I was gone for about 4 months. Came home and jump started my car, drove for about an hour to recharge battery. Battery no longer holds a charge, deep cycle is deep BS. I called Amazon for the warranty claim. At first they tried to refer me to Optima for warranty, until I copied and pasted the Warranty portion of the product listing from Amazon that says Amazon handles all warranty issues. After that clarification, Amazon is sending me a free replacement. Hopefully this one lasts longer and justifies the high price of these batteries. If this one lasts past the 3 year warranty I'll update the review favorably.
customer_reviews.author: I_AM

customer_reviews.title: Please do yourself a favor and buy another one
customer_reviews.text: This battery is incredibly bad. I bought one that didnt last a year. I called Amazon and they sent me a new one. Again, the same issue. The battery doesn’t hold a charge. We are talking about two batteries same model and make having the same issues. Just buy a cheapo battery from Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Herman P.

customer_reviews.title: Stands out from the pack.
customer_reviews.text: Over the past 10 years these have been consistently better performing than others. Stores will push competing AGM batteries with better warranties... but who cares of such warranty if the battery still leaves you stranded? I want my battery NOT to die rather than dying and getting replaced after being stranded. I have put these red, blue, and yellow tops through a lot on various cars / boats and they've consistently lasted 3 years. *ALL other car batteries are made by the same 3 manufacturers, except Optima. Every single different shape, color, and marketing gimmick from sears to batteries plus - all those come from the same three manufacturers except optima who its own independent manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Blair German

customer_reviews.title: Fits but with modification
customer_reviews.text: The D35 model that Amazon claims 'fits' my '13 Honda Accord does fit... with modification. The actual direct fit Optima is the D51R model. It's not as wide front to back as the D35 model. Had to discard the original plastic battery box and use the yellow tray the Optima came with, I also have to buy a new battery tie-down because the one the car came with only fit the original size battery (D51R size). Happy in general bc Optima batteries are amazing but, would've been happier if it was the true direct fit.
customer_reviews.author: Christian K

customer_reviews.title: Total Battery falure after 24 months
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing battery failure after 2 years of normal daily usage. Fortunately Amazon fulfilled the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kepner

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced underperformer! Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 years. I could have bought a generic battery for 70 dollars that would last 3 years. How many starts do you think this battery deserves. None!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult warranty issues
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasted 37 months, one month past the 36 month free replacement warranty. I will not be purchasing batteries from Amazon in the future. They don’t honor the warranty, and tell you to call the manufacturer, who tells you to contact the retailer you purchased it from. I read this battery has an extended 36 month prorated warranty period once the free replacement warranty expires. Time will tell if I’m able to ever have this battery replaced. Obviously I’ve had to purchase another battery already because I have to drive my truck. Buy these at amazon. Save major headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Ligma

customer_reviews.title: Broken battery posts, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This battery had a broken post leaving me and my wife stranded for hours in the mountains with no way to start the truck. Optima has manufactured a lousy product here. We got the truck home on the back of a tow truck because of this terrible battery.
customer_reviews.author: Drehkraft1

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy that I was able to purchase an optima battery ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy that I was able to purchase an optima battery off of Amazon. I purchased the yellow top battery for my race car as they are made for the jostling around more than your standard battery. I had nothing but issues running a standard battery in the race car and would always end up having to replace the battery at least once sometimes twice a year. Ever since putting this battery in the car I've had no issues whatsoever. Amazon is also the cheapest place I could find the optima batteries anywhere on line or even in any of the closest auto stores, so that's also a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Battery quality is bad just after more than a year.
customer_reviews.text: I believe I got a bad battery. Just less than 2 years and it stop working. I need a replacement now. Autozone tries to test it but can’t so they declare it bad. This still under warranty so they need to send me a replacement soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tan D

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery for compition stereo systems
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty large stereo system. The regular car battery left me stranded on several occasions. Honda Accord 2015 got a new battery from them same problem. The lights would dim when I played my music. Bought this optima battery and the lights don’t dim any more also the headlights are brighter. I checked to see how much power it was putting out 13.5 compared to 11.2 or 12.2 from the regular battery. Car was off over night temperatures in the 20 ‘s in CT, the meter was reading at 13.0 haven’t had to jump my car since I put the battery in and it performs out of this world.
customer_reviews.author: Jadon

customer_reviews.title: not worth it. Dead after 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: Had the battery a year and a half. Thought my car had a bad starter motor. Turns out this battery was completely dead after 1.5 years in Minnesota. Couldn't take the punishment. Sticking to duralast gold. Comes with a 3 year warranty I can walk in and get a new one at a local autozone if it's dead before then. This was a waste of $270.
customer_reviews.author: pfictionfan4life

customer_reviews.title: 09 Toyota Tacoma - Great battery
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an excellent battery. Perfect replacement for my 09 Toyota Tacoma.
customer_reviews.author: Sportybg

customer_reviews.title: Optimas used to be great. My old made in USA optima lasted 15 ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit was fair, had to use the spacer on bottom of the battery. Made in Mexico doesn't excite me either. Optimas used to be great. My old made in USA optima lasted 15 years. I will buy an Odyssey battery next. Made in USA and customer support much better
customer_reviews.author: J. Steven

customer_reviews.title: Dont believe the other negative reviews,  order one of these top notch Optima batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering a optima battery thru amazon because of the previous negative reviews. But I decided to go ahead and give it a try. I saved over $100 by purchasing my yellowtop thru amazon and the battery has a production date sticker less than 1 month old. The battery is super fresh and shipping with Amazon prime is always super fast. I couldn't be happier with the product and my experience. Thanks Amazon, once again for saving me lots of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much hype!
customer_reviews.text: This battery is too expensive and the worst part is the life cycle. I drive a 2013 Nissan Pathfinder platinum awd. Heavy electrical usage. I switch out my Nissan battery in 2017 for this optima thinking it was deep cycle. I heard people with heavy speakers,amps. Use this battery. Never would I buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ramsumare

customer_reviews.title: Seems great, fit great, starts fine....
customer_reviews.text: Had a red top outlasted three rigs still kickin after 10yrs, so I bought this... Hope its half as good as its red cousin, though I heard they have moved to Mexico since the last time I purchased the quality seems as good if not better since it came with a step to fit my wife's Camry... Time will tell and I wouldn't be surprised if it outlasted the red due to yellows having more weight... We will see.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great battery
customer_reviews.text: Great battery and is standing up heavy usage from a 2000 and 500 watt car amplifier along with several other accessories to include AC. I leave the radio on without the motor a few times (not on purpose) and it doesn't even phase the optima. My battery gauge is at or around 13.6 with everything on: takes a load off the alternator. This was a good buy (for me!).
customer_reviews.author: New user

customer_reviews.title: The first One Lasted 6 Years
customer_reviews.text: I installed one of these in my car in 2013. It was still working but was allowing the car to go to sleep due to the voltage dropping below 11.8 volts when sitting idle for several days. I installed another one in 2019. The original is still useful for general 12 volt needs where it doesn't matter if it becomes discharged.
customer_reviews.author: murphy

customer_reviews.title: First battery failed within 12 months, and the replacement also failed.
customer_reviews.text: First battery failed within 12 months, and the replacement also failed. Not sure what to think based on other positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: William Yeung

customer_reviews.title: As a woman determined to do the easy fixes herself
customer_reviews.text: As a woman determined to do the easy fixes herself, this is a great battery, gel filled so you don't have to fear droping it like I did the last one. Expensive but worth it because it made everything so easy with the handle that comes on the top. Don't think the price makes the battery last longer, it doesn't. Battery life is the same as any regular battery around $100.
customer_reviews.author: Always Interested

customer_reviews.title: Buy regular car batteries don’t buy Optima
customer_reviews.text: This batteries are now made in Mexico and the quality when down the toilet ever since, don’t buy this batteries, buy the regular batteries way cheaper, this optimas only last a year or two now that they are not made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Castillo

customer_reviews.title: An overpriced battery that does not last!
customer_reviews.text: This battery doesn't last long at all! I got mine in Sept of 2018 and now it is May 2020 and it is dead. I have a Walmart battery that is still working in my other car from 3 years ago. This was my second yellow Optima battery from Amazon that does not last more than 2 years. I will not buy any Optima batteries anymore. Overpriced piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Mickeymouse

customer_reviews.title: Battery went dead in less than 3 months!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery went dead in less than 3 months!!! I hope I can get a replacement or refund. Have to fig out how to put in a request
customer_reviews.author: James Endo

customer_reviews.title: finally starting to die - 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Paid $170, lasted 4 years before a couple weeks of non-use caused it to slow down. Probably still okay for a few months with a charge - but I can't deal with a dead battery somewhere, so time to replace it. Easy install, save a lot of money doing it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: WAS great !!!
customer_reviews.text: ... until the post broke off. Luckily it was a few month within warranty. Up until that point, was all good. Post came unseated and then massive corrosion began, ended up needing to reground and install new terminals. While it was working, I had not a single issue, wheeling, boondocking, etc.
customer_reviews.author: GD-CO

customer_reviews.title: No longer holds a charge after working perfectly for a year
customer_reviews.text: Only a year after purchase, it requires a jump to get started and doesn't hold enough charge to start on its own the next morning. Car works fine on a used standard wal-mart battery, so it's not a parasitic drain issue.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: My last one lasted 13 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these in 2006 and had to replace one this year because it only partially charged. I use them to power things in my truck. It's not connected to or charged from my truck. I pull this out of the bed of my truck ever month or 2 to charge in my garage. It's connected to an inverter that I use to power anything from a 1/2 chuck hammer drive to my laptop and cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: MacGyver

customer_reviews.title: Continual jumpstart issues
customer_reviews.text: Had to jumpstart my car 3-4 times since installing it a few months ago, which could be due to the longlasting cold. Overall though, I am grateful my car has a new battery and it seems to be running fairly smoothly. UPDATE: 1 year later, this battery seems to be failing already. This winter seems to be getting to the battery even more and now the car battery is dead after just having a jumpstart on Tuesday. This is super frustrating, especially after the mechanic told me this was a top of the line battery and that it shouldn't be having this problem. My previous car battery lasted for almost 10 years. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Erica K.

customer_reviews.title: A name I trust
customer_reviews.text: When my stock car battery went, I realized it wasn't much more to get a nice yellow top for the sedan. Holds the juice I need for cca when it's been sitting for awhile. A name I can trust
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Would not but again
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced this after one year and 2 days! Car would not start and mechanic testing showed no charge left. Got new battery with installation from triple a for fifty dollars less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you could easily hear the difference when starting the car
customer_reviews.text: Certainly makes a huge difference when starting my car in the cold mornings, the regular batteries would lose power due to colder temperatures, this one tho, you could easily hear the difference when starting the car, full amperage. Also noticing that the voltage doesn't dropped/change alot when my subwoofers play (I got a digital voltage display gage installed). Looking forward to see how long this battery lasts in my old 1986 mr2.
customer_reviews.author: AW11 Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery
customer_reviews.text: Great Battery but not sure if it's worth the extra cost versus replacing the battery every 5 years. This unit cost probably three times what a normal battery costs. I've used these on all my cars and do like that they are durable and since my van drains a lot of power for utilities (refrigerator) I think it was good for my use case.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: One of the only good starting batteries that can also be deep-cycled
customer_reviews.text: Managed to deep-cycle the OEM battery in my truck too many times and it was failing badly. It turns out that not many batteries are declared to be capable of good automotive startup -and- deep cycling. This one is. I've not had it long enough to be sure, but so far so good it is holding up very well even though I've run it down significantly on a dozen occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Q

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stop my headlights from dimming from my stereo system. I also moved the ground location but my problem is fixed. I can now run the system at full and have the air on blasting on high with the lights on and not even a slight flicker in the lights anymore and car never struggles to start. System has enough power to hit every beat also.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Difference on a 2011 Mustang GT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BATTERY - Still in the preliminary stages but so far so good. I noticed I noticeable difference when I start my car each morning. Cranks right away and I dont fear that the battery will die if I leave the stereo on or the lights on. Amazon stated that this may not fit the 2011 Ford Mustang GT but it did. Especially since the red terminal was changed on the right side of the vehicle. So far so good but dont want to jinx it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how a smaller battery can perform so much better than a standard. Works flawlessly. Good thing to read the reviews about using the extra pieces. Battery needed the extra height. Thanks Amazon reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Becker

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 years!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 2012 Honda Odyssey Elite. The yellow top was supposed to be the best for vehicles that have high demands (rear entertainment, navigation, remote start, etc.). After only 20 months the battery went completely dead and would not hold a charge. After having my alternator tested, I called the Optima customer service line. They said it was out of warranty and the best thing to do is by the Optima battery charger/maintainer to bring the battery back to life. Why would I spend another $200 on a charger that may or may not bring the battery back? DO NOT BUY! Read the other reviews and do not buy this subpar product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Sison

customer_reviews.title: Solved my dead battery issue with Mazda 6
customer_reviews.text: My Mazda 6 has been killing batteries when not driven. I was using a trickle charger to maintain the charge and the previous battery still died. This battery works to solve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: slidvendetta

customer_reviews.title: 2007 Toyota Camry Hybrid auxiliary battery
customer_reviews.text: Installed successfully as an auxiliary battery in a 2007 Toyota Camry Hybrid. Be sure to use one of the plastic spacers that comes with the battery for this application.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: This battery didn't even last 8 months!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware - I bought this Deep Cell battery for my Jeep CJ-7, which I don't drive frequently, about 8 months ago with the sole intent that if it went completely dead there wouldn't be any damage to or reduced performance from this Deep Cycle battery. After 6 months I started having issues with the battery holding a charge; another 2 months later the battery is completely dead and will not hold a charge at all. Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stellar Hybrid Performance
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal batteries to use in a Honda Civic Hybrid. Removed same # after five years of auto service, and now it is part of my home emergency power pack. Due to the unique way these batteries are charged by the Honda Hybrid, I HIGHLY recommended this. They are built for maritime abuse and thus serve a Hybrid car in exemplary fashion.
customer_reviews.author: MikeF_TX2008

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long/leaked upon dying
customer_reviews.text: I havent been driving much with COVID so my car was sitting for ~2 weeks before I figured I should drive it to keep the battery/systems in good shape. Car wouldnt turn on so i opened the trunk and the battery had leaked over the terminals and in the engine compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Porsche 996!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly only bought it because someone else had a 996! BIG BIG BIG difference. I thought my starter or alternator was going out... Slow cranking while hot... Not anymore! Minor minor modification to get it to stay in there. Some people use an old wrench for a "spacer" or whatever... you can use a bolt or anything that will fit and it works just fine. Mine is track ready and I drive like a mad man and it still stays in place just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sw2Ps

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the customer service
customer_reviews.text: Defective, did not work properly. Returned it for a refund; I was happy with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: S Trexler

customer_reviews.title: Reliability!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I get 3 years minimum life in the Desert and 5-7 years here in Nor-Cal. It works great until the day it starts to hesitate - then get your new one on order!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Smith

customer_reviews.title: Finally had to replace my 9 yr old optima
customer_reviews.text: best batteries. period. I use the yellow top in my tundra with a winch and also my wife's lexus due to all the electronics. The last one lasted 9 years. Yes, 9 years.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Battery died within 1 year (with only 8K miles)
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a big fan of Optima batteries and have them in 5 of my family cars (I also recommend them). I've read several reviews where Optima batteries have died within a year. This finally happened to me... I'm disappointed. This is a pricey battery... Not sure if I will buy another...
customer_reviews.author: Lance F Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Just after 2 years of use the battery is dead and won't even start a hot car
customer_reviews.author: Arse56

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Not what they use to be. Can't take a beating, won't hold a year of life, took back the last 2 batteries. Not sure how they last in other states in the cold but in south Florida they don't last. Last yellow top I'd own.
customer_reviews.author: michael ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Cranks my Xterra over in a heartbeat compared to past batteries.... arrived in the original Optima packaging with no damage. One note is to use the included spacer if it seems short after install into the battery box. Learned the long way.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming

customer_reviews.title: #1 BATTERY !! OPTIMA !!
customer_reviews.text: There is no substitute for the BEST ! OPTIMA !! And being a Prime member got me a Great discount on this $342.00 Battery .. I paid with Tax $192.00 !!! Outstanding for this high quality battery. INCREASED FLOW OF ELECTRONS ! EVERYTHING WORKS BETTER , LONGER , FASTER !!!

customer_reviews.title: Battery is dead, wont charge.
customer_reviews.text: Battery arrived dead. Tried trickle charging it over night at 2 amps. My car would barely start and a week later after trying to charge more, my car has died twice while out and about. It seems like a great battery but seems to be defective...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warranty? No Issue or Problems
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this GREAT battery on April 8, 2012 and just a few days ago it stopped taking charge (Its a product, things happen). So like we all know Amazon is NOT considered an authorized dealer according to Optima BUT I called Amazon customer service, told them what Optima told me and that my battery is now defective. He put me on hold for a few mins and got permission to send me a new battery NO CHARGE and all I have to do is dispose of the defective battery. I'll be getting a new one next week according to the tracking! THANKS AMAZON FOR SHOWING GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE & I WILL CONTINUE TO PURCHASE ITEMS HERE!
customer_reviews.author: Kissoon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Will never buy a regular battery again. Made a great difference in running my stereo equipment and the rest of the lights i have in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: Great battery everyone should have at least one?
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with this battery. The worries are over once you purchased a deep cycle cell. It came in fully charge but I still tindered it to be on the safe size. I have bought this battery for multiple Vehicles and it had never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Rowlette

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: AGM battery is the single most important and cost-effective upgrade you can get for your car whether it's a fully-built race car or just your mileage workhorse. Absolutely worth the cost of admission. Have this or a variant thereof in all three of my cars. No water to add, lifespan is much longer, and the CCAs for winter time are insane. Instant cranks every time.
customer_reviews.author: M Courter

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and less than a month after install I woke up to a dead battery and a car that wouldn't start. I didn't leave anything on and I just got a new alternator that wasn't the problem. I'm giving this product 2 stars because I emailed the company and within 2 hours I had a response and my money refunded. Pretty sad that it didn't work optima used to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio S.

customer_reviews.title: The only good thing about optima battery is that it's lighter than ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it has free replacement for 36 mos, who's gonna sit around waiting for it to come in. My previous local store premium battery was still running strong after 4 years. The only good thing about optima battery is that it's lighter than regular ones. So, if your application is racing or show cars, then it's good, otherwise, ...
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful for the future
customer_reviews.text: I've had the battery for a couple months, no problems. I previously owned a RedTop Group 35 for 8 years. If this gets near that kind of longevity this will have been a great purchase.
